Trade/Device Name(s): Thermo Scientific CEDIA Cannabinoids OFT Assay
Thermo Scientific CEDIA THC OFT Calibrators
Submitter Information: Thermo Fisher Scientific, Clinical Diagnostic Division
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Thermo Scientific CEDIA Cannabinoids OFT Assay and THC OFT Calibrators for qualitative determination of cannabinoids in oral fluid using homogeneous enzyme immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative determination of cannabinoids in human oral fluid at 3 ng/mL cutoff collected exclusively with the Oral-Eze Saliva Collection System, with assay calibrated against Delta-9 THC and performed on the MGC 240; for clinical laboratory use only, providing preliminary analytical test results.
